name: Modern Sniper Fury Warrior 3D: Enemy Base Assassin
name_original: Modern Sniper Fury Warrior 3D: Enemy Base Assassin
description:
Take your sniper, aim and start shooting your enemies. If you like war games or FPS games, you will love Modern Sniper Fury Assassin: one of the most fun and addicting shooting games ever!
Sniper Fury – 3D Assasin includes:- Normal Mode – You see world with sniper camera on your hands, you can shoot and do photos with camera - Zoom Mode - simulates real sniper scope and zoom + you can do shooting and photos - Real gun sound with best quality!

A new 3D shooting game with counter strike mode. The game is built on the latest 3D technology which allow player to experience the most real feeling in a shooting game.

The beautiful game scenes will take you go through extremely dramatic battles. Be accurate shooting, fighting with all your power to become a hero protecting the world.
In the game, you will have to defend with a lot waves of enemy in different locations. Your mission is to survive from enemy to win the final battle.

Features:
- Many unique maps and weapons
- SIMPLE and INTUITIVE controls.
